children.txtContent: = [$ID] +' Last Modified ' + if(getMonth([$Modified])==0, 'Jan', if(getMonth([$Modified])==1, 'Feb', if(getMonth([$Modified])==2, 'Mar', if(getMonth([$Modified])==3, 'Apr',  if(getMonth([$Modified])==4, 'May', if(getMonth([$Modified])==5, 'Jun', if(getMonth([$Modified])==6 , 'Jul', if(getMonth([$Modified])==7, 'Aug', if(getMonth([$Modified])==8 , 'Sep', if(getMonth([$Modified])==9, 'Oct', if(getMonth([$Modified])==10, 'Nov', if(getMonth([$Modified])==11, 'Dec', ''))))))))))))+ ' ' +getDate([$Modified])+ ', '+ getYear([$Modified]) + ' by ' + [$personIterator.title] +' v'+[$owshiddenversion]

=[$personIterator.title] + ' started on '+ if(getMonth([$Created])==0, 'Jan', if(getMonth([$Created])==1, 'Feb', if(getMonth([$Created])==2, 'Mar', if(getMonth([$Created])==3, 'Apr',  if(getMonth([$Created])==4, 'May', if(getMonth([$Created])==5, 'Jun', if(getMonth([$Created])==6 , 'Jul', if(getMonth([$Created])==7, 'Aug', if(getMonth([$Created])==8 , 'Sep', if(getMonth([$Created])==9, 'Oct', if(getMonth([$Created])==10, 'Nov', if(getMonth([$Created])==11, 'Dec', ''))))))))))))+ ' ' +getDate([$Created])+ ', '+ getYear([$Created]) +' in '+ substring([$Categories],indexOf([$Categories], ' '),lastIndexOf([$Categories]+';', ';'))
